itunes:title: Ezra 1; 3-7 & Nehemiah 2; 4-6; 8 -- Part 1 : Dr. Jared W. Ludlow
title: Ezra 1; 3-7 & Nehemiah 2; 4-6; 8 -- Part 1 : Dr. Jared W. Ludlow
description:
Do we ever simultaneously rejoice and weep? Dr. Jared Ludlow explores the Jewish people returning to Jerusalem to rebuild the temple and rejoicing to have what they had lost, as well as feeling sorrowful for the years of exile and the loss of the glory of Solomon’s temple.

Please rate and review the podcast!

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
